类 RecipeDisplayView

java.lang.Object
javafx.stage.Window
javafx.stage.Stage
view.RecipeDisplayView
所有已实现的接口:
javafx.event.EventTarget
public class RecipeDisplayView extends javafx.stage.Stage
RecipeDisplayView is a JavaFX Stage that provides the user interface for displaying recipe details. This view shows comprehensive recipe information including ingredients, instructions, nutritional data, and provides options to edit or delete the recipe.
从以下版本开始:
1.0

  • 方法详细资料

    • updateNutritionalDisplay

      public void updateNutritionalDisplay(float totalCalories, float totalProtein, float totalFat, float totalCarbs)
      Updates the nutritional information display through the controller.
      参数:
      totalCalories - Total calories for the recipe
      totalProtein - Total protein content
      totalFat - Total fat content
      totalCarbs - Total carbohydrate content
